name: Passimian

attacks.name: Swipe
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon has a Tool attached to it, discard it, create a copy, and attach the copy to this Pokemon.

attacks.name: Fling
attacks.effect: You may target a Benched Pokemon with this attack. Either way, you may discard a Tool attached to this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 20 more damage.

flavor: Throwing things around rudely is their favorite.
